rationale: This trade maximizes Team A's projected points by a significant margin. The acquired players, Ja'Marr Chase (19.5) and Bijan Robinson (18.5), have a combined projection of 38.0. The players offered, Christian McCaffrey (18.6) and Terry McLaurin (14.3), have a combined projection of 32.9. This results in a net gain of +5.1 projected points, consolidating roster strength with two elite cornerstone players.
